website_summaries.verdict: The best callus remover on the market today. It's a bit on the higher end, but its effectiveness is well worth the cost.
pros: This rechargeable callus remover is waterproof, so it can be used in the shower, and it comes with a coarse and extra-coarse roller
The remover is gentle on the feet
cons: May need frequent recharging, but that's a small price to pay for the convenience it offers

website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and easy to handle, this electric foot file has an extended operating time compared to other filers.
pros: Includes 1 coarse roller and 1 super-coarse roller, both of which cover a larger surface area
Applying heavy pressure stalls the motor, which prevents you from filing too much, which could lead to soreness

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I get regular pedicures but only during sandal season. This is fabulous for the rest of the time! My heels get so calloused and dry, the edges of the skin around my heels lift just enough to be scratchy and rough so much so that they ruin socks, hose, even damaged a bedsheet. I used this once a week and after only 2 times, my heels are so much better. I am truly impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: luvobx

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My feet were in bad shape when I ordered this product. I had been using pumice stones and foot files, but I wasn't getting anywhere fast. It only took about 4 sessions with this product to get the desired results. I spent between 5-10 minutes on each foot per session. I have included a before and after picture to illustrate the drastic difference. So happy with this purchase. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LucyRx

customer_reviews.title: Silkiest feet I've ever had from this
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that has happened to my feet in their whole lives. I was beginning to think that my feet were just going to be rough and callused the rest of my life and then I used this. I bought this because I really wanted to do a foot mask but I'm breast feeding so that wasn't an option. I'm very glad I tried this first though. My feet are so silky soft and I've only used it twice so far. I can't speak to how long this machine lasts (only used it twice, remember?) But I have to say - I think if it dies tomorrow it was still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KwiatCat

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My sister has a similar popular brand that gave her great results. I was Leary of purchasing a different much less version. I took a chance and not only did I get great results, overall the experience was better. Easy to clean, easy to change the roller, which I haven’t had to yet and use it regularly. I highly recommend this product. Have had this well over 3 mos.
customer_reviews.author: julie worrthen

customer_reviews.title: I have what are affectionately referred to as "cavewomen feet" ...
customer_reviews.text: I have what are affectionately referred to as "cavewomen feet". Deep callused feet that crack and hurt, especially after a summer of wearing flip flops. This handy tool has done in minutes what a lifetime of pumice stones and scrubs could not. Powerful tool lasts for a long time between charges. Using this once a week has transformed my feet. My husband is no longer grossed out by them! Hurrah!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weber

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, weak.
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly thick calloused heels and usually use the razor blade type scrapers. Thought I'd try one of this type which sands the callous off. Well, don't waste your money on this one, the best it can do is polish your callous. If you've got anything more than just dry skin on your heels, forget it. It stops as soon as you put any pressure and if you lighten the pressure, doesn't do anything. Went back to my razor blade callous scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Works effectively
customer_reviews.text: Purchase arrived on time and with nice packaging and box. CM-201 with nice packaging and ergonomic design. Easy to charge and assemble and begin to use. Instruction manual easy to follow. CM-201 does what it says it will and is easy to use, painless and can see immediate effects. Relatively easy to use with use of included brush. Unfortunately, some parts of coarse get quickly dirty and are difficult to clean despite brush. Means will probably have to get refills after several months. I've own for several weeks now and no problems so far. Happy with purchase and would recommend. Would like to try other caremeus products.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Leo

customer_reviews.title: I got it today and honestly it is like nothing I have ever seen before
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can do a hundred Stars for this product.. I got it today and honestly it is like nothing I have ever seen before, it's amazing. This is 100% the truth, I have never been able as an adult to where sandals because I work too much in Boots and my feet we're just embarrassing. There were times that I went to the beach 4 a swimming pool with my children and I had to where socks even when I was swimming because I was embarrassed, not anymore.This was the very first day,I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Donny R

customer_reviews.title: I charged this overnight after I received it. When ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this...utter garbage. I charged this overnight after I received it. When I used it the next day, the power didn't last more than 10 minutes. It did remove some of the calluses, but the motor was weaker than expected. I wanted to return it, but found it is was not eligible for a return even though I'd only had it two days. That's outrageous! The Tip2Toe callus remover is very powerful and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: You will Never need a professional pedicure again if you use this Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is one amazing product!!! It not only removed the rough callouses on my big toes & my heels....it literally turned my feet as soft as a new born baby🤗🤗 Professional pedicures at my salon still left me with the same rough feet!! My husband said he never imagined I would ever have "baby soft" feet😍😍!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The reviews left me worried that the product would break quickly or be underwhelming at best, but I hated my calouses and the creams just weren't cutting it. My hubby saw me using it and ordered replacement rollers and now we leave it constantly charging and each of us use it everyday and have our own personal rollers (for sanitation reasons). We would highly recommend this and feel that the value is absolutely there. My husband even uses it to trim his nails (not an intended use). I don't expect that it will fail on us now as we've already used it so much and it still is working so well.
customer_reviews.author: amikns717

customer_reviews.title: Practice with care
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it removes the callus. It just takes practice to get the correct amount removed without making your foot sorer. After the first time, I was more careful to find a way to see what I was doing and did not hold it on so long. It takes a very short time with each stroke to check on your progress and make sure you do not remove too much tissue. My foot feels better but not perfect yet. It is better than going to the podiatrist every month and less expensive than one visit. Just exercise caution and go slow until you get the results you seek.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good product but slows down
customer_reviews.text: The callus remover seems to work great other than it stops as I am rolling it on my heel and other parts of my foot with callus. I’ve tried going softer and holding it different ways and it seems to be the way it works. Customer service wrote to me and gave me suggestions. I’m trying them. It’s not working. Working ok at first then feels like it’s losing power. Has nothing to do with pressure
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Battle

customer_reviews.title: TRASH!
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t even made an effort to tape and box this item. It was opened and looked used. To me the price not worth the trouble returning so I tried to use it, but it doesn’t work well. It stopped if you press a little harder against your callus plus it heats up in your skin.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well at all. I followed all the directions and It charged for over 24hrs. It hardly turns. My feet do not stay soft. I used to have a battery operated one from another company and it was a lot better. Maybe I got a dud? I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rere9

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This product left my feet noticeably smoother after 4 5 minute treatments on each foot. I don't have bad heels, but do have pressure points on the balls of my feet from running. Pretty hard and yellowed callouses. I have seen an improvement in the appearance although this tool isn't able to remove it all. I'd actually be a little fearful to go any deeper because I don't want all the padding on my skinny feet to disappear! Not a bad product. I did order the extra coarse refills so I might check in after that.
customer_reviews.author: lizzz

customer_reviews.title: Works well except for the rechargable battery
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a drum sander for calluses. Maybe the sandpaper could be a little rougher to quicken it's action but of course there is a trade off between how fast and possible going too deep. The biggest problem is that the rechargeable battery does not hold the charge for more than a few minutes. Easy fix, just use plugged in and the cord is 4 or 5 feet long. I tried a lot of manual tools before this purchase and non worked.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schenkman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works!  Update: Only works for a short time before you need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, will save me money on pedicures! Sorry to update my review, but I have only had this product for 5 months. I have used it twice each month, tonight it completely stopped working. It does work great, but wanted buyers to be aware that mine only worked for a total of 10 times. I changed my 5 star review to 1 star. I figure since it DID work temporarily it deserved 1 star. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia King

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but does not hold a charge for too long.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, works great, leaves my hills baby-smooth after the first short time use. I love that it has a spear replacement roll and it is easy to buy more.Sadly, it doesn't hold a charge for too long. Charging time is 8 hours and you have to keep an eye on it- it doesn't shuts off by itself! ...Baby sitting... Would be much easier to keep it plugged and be able to finish polishing process! It is something to work on fore the designing team.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Levallie

customer_reviews.title: This product is a must for rough feet.
customer_reviews.text: I had the worst cracked heels. This product works great! I use it a few times a week. It cleans up so well. I rinse it under water and use a brush on the rotating wheel while its on and it cleans up quickly. I have had this for almost a year and have had NO issues with it. It charges fine and works great!
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is great: easy to use, quiet, not too aggressive. I have a callus on one foot that gets so thick it hurts to walk. Having the doctor shave it off works great but is inconvenient. This magic rotating "sander" does a great job of keeping it in check. Also, my heels look and feel smoother. It feels good to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: PIp Emma

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I am way too e cited about this foot file!
customer_reviews.text: I try to take care of my feet and soak and polish and file but it just wasn’t getting it done. I was embarrassed in yoga class about my dry cracked heels. I was skeptical but it was soooo easy to use. Took the filet out and went to work. The dead skin pile was dosgusting but what a difference after one use! I would have never been able to get those results with a manual file. Highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.text: For years I had terrible problems with calluses on my feet. Now, thanks to foot-softening cream and this little gadget, I do not. Yes, it's a little bit difficult getting the grinding wheel to exactly where you want it, but I always manage to get the job done. And I do not have horrible callus pain in my feet anymore. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The perfect product for the best results!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had thought to purchase a product like this years ago! After years of suffering and money spent, I did some research and decided on this product. After the first use I knew I made the right decision! It’s so easy to use and caused me no pain. After the first use I applied lotion and felt like I had normal feet again. I’ve been using it regularly now and will forever!!! No more pumice stones or callus removers for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my daughter, hinting for Christmas ideas, if she ever used a Callus remover when she gave her self pedicures. She said she had but still had to use emery boards to smooth the skin out. That let me know she definitely could use a Care Me callus remover, fbecause it leaves the skin smooth. Purchased one for each of my girls and they love them, just like I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie28

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I've never had happier feet in my life!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just Wow! I have been a restaurant manager and server since I was 15. Don't want to say how old I am now, but lets say over 20 years on my feet. I have had rough, calloused feet and with just a few treatments I have the softest/happiest feet I have ever had. I'm in heaven! I have tried creams, pumice stones, etc. etc. and nothing has worked the wonders this little machine has in such a short time. Thank you! I should have taken before and after photos to show-but honestly would be a bit embarrassed to show how bad my feet were! I just wish I would have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoRachael

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Throw away all your junky callus removers and buy this. I had the worst feet with thick and blackened calluses (from black shoes) and with the first use my feet were so much better! now I use it about 3x a week and my feet are normal, i don't have to hide my feet or pay for expensive pedicures just for calluses. Great value, best one on the market. I am looking forward to sandal weather! Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have cracked feet
customer_reviews.text: I have bad cracked feet. This helps take it down so then you can use a special foot lotion to heal. I wish it was a little more powerful cause of how bad my feet are but for normal cracked feet this is perfect. If you have very bad cracked feet you just have to sit there and do it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreenfarmboy

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after three uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter, she's a mother of three and busy. She doesn't have a lot of opportunities to pamper herself. She was delighted the first two times using it, but it completely stopped working the third time. I had to buy her another brand. She was so worried about telling me, we missed the opportunity to return it for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have used creams, ointments, and other devices for my heels. Some helped, but were very difficult and messy to use. On my first use of this item...I was sold as my heel improved 75%. I am sure with continued use my heels will be soft and supple in no time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: duchessnj

customer_reviews.title: Leave it plugged in too long - Throw it away.
customer_reviews.text: It was actually good at removing the calluses however, I would not purchase it again for the following reason. For a recharging system, it is easy and rather inexpensive to include the ability to prevent overcharging of a unit. The Care me Callus Remover does not have this ability. There is no warning about this online but when you get the product there is a warning not to charge more than eight hours. I was very careful about this but one time it was charged too long and has not worked since. This is so unnecessary because the technology is there to protect the battery. A good method to achieve resales however. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell R. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: ... I find a product that lives up to its good reviews. This is one of them
customer_reviews.text: Very seldom do I find a product that lives up to its good reviews. This is one of them. For the first time in many years, the hard, rough calluses on my heels are disappearing. Just after one use, I can see and feel the difference. After an application of some Shea butter, I can tell that my heels will be sandal-ready very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not work on my feet. I’m constantly barefoot or working on my feet so my calluses might be too much for this tool. BUT I emailed them and their customer service was AMAZING!!!! Even though the product didn’t work for me, they worked with me and thats more than I can say for a lot of other companies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment. I already have a callus/hard skin remover which is mains powered and proved much superior to this machine. I initially wanted something much more powerful to deal with the hard skin on the heels of my feet. The plain fact of the matter is that this device stops working as soon as the slightest pressure is applied. By slightest I do mean slightest. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kwaters

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURN possible
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: So, it works pretty well. Although I wish I could have returned it, given that I can't it's an OK purchase. WARNING: You CANNOT RETURN this product. Sadly, I've only found this out because I want to return it. This has stupid recharging. You can't just plug it in & go: it says you can't recharge for more than 5 hours, which means you have to babysit it while it's charging. Buy en Emjoi -- they have fantastic products.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with feet, but not anymore!🤗
customer_reviews.text: I had rough heels, so I purchased this product. I noticed a difference in my feet with the first use. My feet are so much smoother. I love this item and would recommend it to anyone wishing to have softer feet.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Davison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good purchase. Had a callus on my foot in a bad spot that would hurt while driving. 1 use and the callus is almost completely gone and it doesnt hurt anymore. Also for the people complaining that it stops just be patient and take your time. You should not be pushing down hard enough to stop it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a used replacement with another customer’s  callus on it
customer_reviews.text: After one month, it does not have enough power after full charges. It worked very well for the first few days. I ordered a replacement. The seller sent me a used one with another customer’s calluses on it. Disgusting!!! Worst shopping experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: zyq

customer_reviews.title: Callus Begone! 2
customer_reviews.text: I have physical limitations, so using a file or emery board type of callus remover, which requires repetitive motions is out of the question for me. But Care Me callus remover works wonderfully, just turn the switch and it does all the work for you! I will be purchasing more as gifts, I love it! Update- I am still VERY pleased with my Care me callus remover, so much so that I did purchase one for my daughter as a Christmas gift, I'm sure she will love it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't hold enough charge to complete both feet
customer_reviews.text: Two issues dropped its rating to 2 stars: 1. After 18 months of occasional use (at most 2X/month) it utterly and completely died. I expected it to last longer. 2. Even when new, the battery's charge would become too weak to continue before I could complete treating both my feet. I've replaced this unit with one that has a cord so it will maintain full power for the entire job.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: BROKE 12 DAYS AFTER THE “RETURN-BY” DATE.😣
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on August 5th and now, Sept 16th, it is dead. It is past the “return-by” date by about 12 days... so basically I can’t get a refund. Sketchy. 🥴 LOVED THIS LITTLE GADGET THOUGH. Will buy my next one from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this and so I ordered it and used it on my husband. He stands on his feet all day as a barber. I tried it out this morning and it works! it will take several more uses to remove it all but I am a believer! He is feeling the difference already! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the Faith - I am VIP
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 August 7th The motor is not extremely strong and my calluses haven't disappeared immediately but I will give it a couple more days. So far, it has done pretty well and has removed at least a layer of dead skin so I will trust in this product and hope it continues to work well. I will post throughout my experience with it. September 20th after about more than a month the motor stopped running well and callus dust just completely filled it. the charge did not last long and the motor is not strong at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: It works👌🇱🇷
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a 62 year old male that never used anything to keep heals looking good. I’m a big guy and had cracks on my feet from wearing flip flops a lot around the lake. With just 2 treatments, my heal cracks are gone and feet look better than ever. I wish I had bought this product year’s ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh ivey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool and how it works but it doesn't hold a charge at all. I can charge it for hours and have to rush to be able to do both feet. And I just mean a quick daily use, not a long sanding session.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Marathon runner approved!!
customer_reviews.text: As a marathon runner and “gym rat” I am almost always in sneakers- often to hide my terrible calluses and blisters that turned into calluses. I had tried every at home callous remover and none of them did much more than remove that first layer and leave my arms sore from filing/scrubbing. I was weary about this product cause of the price point but no joke- prob my best amazon buy to date (and that’s coming from someone who spends prob $200+ a week on amazon buys). Really can’t say enough great things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: My heels finally feel soft and look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Finally my feet look amazing! I have been looking for a machine that is not overly expensive but makes my feet soft and looking marvelous. And I did. This is perfect value and my feet and heels has never looked this good. I also use petroleum gel on my feet at night with socks and you wake up so soft. Great value for the machine and the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Eme

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my husband's 1/2 inch thick (seriously) callous ridden feet. It worked wonders! Of course I wasn't able to get all of it off, but he is on his way to a smoother and softer feet! Pros: Power chargeable. Don't have to scramble to find batteries and doing less to pollute the world. Comes with a replacement roller and a brush. The head of the unit can be ran under water to get the yucky stuff rinsed off. Con: The roller is too close to the head of the unit so all the debris get caught under the roller which makes it necessary to clean it in mid-session.
customer_reviews.author: BearBear

customer_reviews.title: I'd give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: I have a callous on the ball of my foot and cracked heels. I go get pedicures regularly and they use almost a cheese grater. I saw flakes of white when this started up. It was amazing. It just kept flaking till it was smooth.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is FANTASTIC! Believe me, I have tried the best of all the callous removers out there...And this one, has been the easiest, and most effective by far. I don't have to work at removing the dry skin by "scraping away"...Simply, I just turn on the Care Me product, and it sands away the excess dry skin without much effort at all. The crack on my heels are gone, almost instantly - and the roughness on the bottoms of my feet no longer there. I love how this is rechargeable rather than battery operated. After use, I can show off my new pretty feet by applying on Palmer's butter. Great, great product!
customer_reviews.author: MOVERMYERIII

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product. When I tried to use it, it just doesn't work. The second it touches your skin it turns off. So not sure if it is a default or it is actually suppose to be like that. I wouldn't recommend this product at all. Save yourself the money honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Love the plug in charger and that it came with 2 heads. Worked well. It's a bit fast for me; I think I'd prefer something a little slower so it's not as rough on my feet but it works.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This smoothed out my calluses from the first use. They recommend using it no more than 1/week. I used it about every other week. The battery started getting weak in 6 months and went completely dead in 10 months. They give no contact information on what to do for replacement. Once you're outside of the 6 month warranty, you're expected to buy a whole new unit. Too expensive to buy this for the 6 months the company expects this to last.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia White

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, I love this thing! I was skeptical at first, there are so many electric callus removers out there, but this one got excellent reviews and was on sale...I am not regretting this purchase! The skin that this thing removes on my feet is both enthralling and disgusting, I use it every other morning, after a night of softening my feet with foot cream and spa socks. ( I have really awful, dry, cracked soles and heels). This item really helps keep my dry feet in check, and they look wonderful now with a little tender loving care!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have this back in my pedicure kit
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have this back in my grooming kit. I lost the charger to my other one, so I finally just caved and bought another one. Although, the other one had a longer blue callous remover, but this will do.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Princess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. As soon as I received it, (Which came the very next day, by the way) I fell in love with it. I've had a difficult time getting the dead skin off my feet. I was always embarrassed to bare my feet because they looked so ugly. Now I can wear my pretty sandals again. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: FAITH K.

customer_reviews.title: My heels are horrible. They are dried and cracked from going barefoot
customer_reviews.text: My heels are horrible. They are dried and cracked from going barefoot. As well, I have calluses from years of play tennis and racket ball on hard courts. This callus remover works great! Be careful not to spend too much time on one spot. You will feel the friction burn before it's too late. Being rechargeable is a plus. It also comes with a spare grinder wheel.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gore

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your feet healthy definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing my feet feel awesome it took off years dead skin in a matter of minutes
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I have super dry feet so I go get a pedicure.... Well I purchased this product and finally used it last night..... For the first time in 30 plus years, I can say that i found something that i like for my Feet.... it did a miracle for my calluses .... my feet feel like a baby bottom no lie!! I like if so much, i'm thinking about purchasing another. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: adrienne evans

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Product seems less effective than a manual pumice stone or similar. Using any type of pressure causes the wheel to stop. Using light pressure, it is simply not very effective. It does work, but just very very slowly. Not worth it. I have no idea where all these 5 star reviews are coming from, perhaps the one I received is somehow defective, but I doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy (:
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was intended to save me time and money. After receiving and using my Care Me cm-201 product, I mist say this was a good investment. The Care Me cm-201 came in a nice looking box. I was very impressed with the overall quality of the item. I'm a busy guy and I work outdoors in harsh environments. My hands take a biting and I've always had dry feet. The 40 turns per second make it quick and easy to remove hard dry callus. Now I can skip a month at the pedicure salon and save $40.00 I really like that. I would definitely recommend Care Me cm-201 this was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: AMO851

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: It has a very weak motor, if you press down very much the the thing stops, my never gets a full change, you get what you pay for, not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Greg Paul

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes ! I am serious !! A miracle worker !! No more wasted time soaking and reheating water baths, no more wasted money on oils and creams and lotions , etc.... I started with two thick and cracking calloused feet, as usual. But, this time unlike the dozens and dozens of times of before, I immediately ended with completely pretty soft pink feet !! I could feel my shoes on my feet again, and it was such a relief to slip into my sandals without the embarrassment of unsightly scaly yellow dry cracked heel and feet. This little guy is my new bff !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very Serious Coarse Grind
customer_reviews.text: This performs as claimed however it would be nice if I could find a slightly less coarse grind on this. It is very very coarse. Sure it works on the bottom callouses of one abused feet and it certain does heavy lifting in this area but we don't all need the industrial grade sanding every time. Rechargeable works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What It's Supposed to Do
customer_reviews.text: This is a dynamite product. I had a large callus on the ball of my foot and after appointments with two podiatrists and several prescriptions, the callus was still there. I tried a handheld abrasive tool but it didn't make a difference and wore my arm out. The callus remover worked. One session removed 90% and a second session took it down to bare skin - I hesitated to grind it all the way down in one session but it would've been okay. The callus hasn't returned because my foot sets flat in my shoe now instead of setting on the callus and sliding back and forth. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Callus remover has worked as advertised. Feet are smoother ...
customer_reviews.text: Callus remover has worked as advertised. Feet are smoother and skin removed is visible after each session. I have severe callus on the outside front of my feet and typically have my foot shaved 3 - 4 times per year. I believe all of these machines are overpriced but each cost less than one trip to the doctor for a shaving (and I think most things are overpriced). If the tool lasts more than one year, I would add star if possible (just by comparing Dr. $$ to product $$). I hope it lasts. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the fact that it plugs in fool you. It has absolutely no power. Yes it spins, but don't push it to much into the callus or it will stop. It would take less time to make a diamond out of coal then remove the callus from my heel...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would do so much better than my manual foot sander but I've gone back to using my simple old sandpaper foot sander. I find I can get a better sanding when I use the manual sander, and I'm more likely to do it because I can keep my manual one in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly enough power for a guy. Charging methods need improvement. Charging an item like this is not something I want to have to think about. When to charge, how long to charge, when did I use it last,was it plugged in etc
customer_reviews.author: JTE

customer_reviews.title: T. NORTON - LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of this product - since I bought another brand recently that was a waste of money and I returned. But since my heels need help I thought I would give this Power Electric Callus remover a try. I get pedicures and the "acid" they use just makes my heels worse - If they use their "cheese grater" my heels are really tore up. I can honestly say this devise is wonderful. Where has it been all these years. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: T. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the little extra investment
customer_reviews.text: A worthy opponent to my dry, cracked heels, but don't be misled, I worked on my feet for about 30 minutes not 2-3 minutes as advertised! This was no surprise to me, just sayin'. I love the fact it's more powerful and has a rougher spinner than the other brand I bought about 2 months ago. My cracks were not totally eliminated, but darn close-one is deep, so I am wearing shea butter with socks and tennis shoes around the house because going barefoot or wearing flips all the time in a Si. Cal desert climate is a recipe for dry, cracked feet. Love this device and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: HALE HUNT

customer_reviews.title: It came to me in a time of need.
customer_reviews.text: After my partner informed they wouldnt be helping me get my feet together anymore, i decided to look into other methods. I looked into different Callus removers from ezvid.wiki and this remover came up in the top 3 underneath their list. i was weary of this because it was also affordable. So i purchased this right away and about 10 mins later I noticed a drastic difference already. I am a man so so i didnt think it would be as strong as i needed it to be. But i was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marz Knicely

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it removed my callus quickly and painlessly. I was worried it would be too weak and take forever to make a difference, or that it would be too harsh where a little slip could injure some other part of my foot. Worried for nothing, the strength of the appliance was perfect and it's even pretty quiet. I was very impressed with the overall quality of what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Happy with this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic product! I was a little hesitant to order at first but I am so glad that I did. For less than a price of just one pedicure I now have super soft uncallused feet. As an extra bonus, my BF also had some deep cracks which are now healing because the callus around the cracks has been removed. Not saying that this will heal the crack, but with the callus removed the cracks can now heal. I am very happy with this purchase and will be buying these for Christmas gifts ;-)
customer_reviews.author: CHajash

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found It!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything on the market and finally I've found something actually works on my hard cracked heels! You just have to be patient, do a little at a time, and then after a couple of days your feet are smooth as can be. Be sure, though, to lotion them up every night before you go to bed with whatever lotion works best for you (I prefer Gold Bond for Diabetics, even though I'm not diabetic!) and put those white socks on. I'm so happy I bought this product, and you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product when it works
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product when it worked. First day I put it to charge for 6-8 hours as recommended. I used it for my callus and it did wonders. After that I let it recharge for about 6 hours. The next day the power was lackluster that I could stop the spinning with my finger. I gave it the benefit of the doubt and changed the outlet that I was charging from. However the same thing happened. I'm not impressed, the battery probably is defective. That being said the instructions had the numbers crossed out and handwritten for the number of hours needed for charging. A good product that only worked once for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Lin

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Charger failed first recharge.
customer_reviews.text: Would probably get a 5 if charger worked and it lasted. Works well,,,,be careful of abrasions if adjacent skin is soft. Don't know why survey asked about moisturizing it's a grinder.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm saying byebye to the dried skin that accumulates on the outside of my big toe. Be careful to keep this unit moving across the skin to avoid a friction burn. It works great. So glad!
customer_reviews.author: LittleCunningPlan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at the difference between this one and the original version. The original was fantastic or so I thought. This is the best foot filer ever. It took off the dead skin on my feet in a few minutes cause at least 20 mins on each foot on the original. My feet are so smooth. I love that it no longer requires batteries. Just charge and go.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: But I also like to wear sandals in the warm weather and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a hard time getting pedicures because my feet are extremely ticklish. But I also like to wear sandals in the warm weather and I want to have pretty feet. I've gotten other pedicure kits but they always seem such a hassle and more trouble than they're worth. I have to say, I love love love this product. Its easy to use, works quickly, doesn't tickle me (yay!) and leaves my feet soft and ready for public exposure. I would recommend this 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: *works good *Great price *Instant results * The power doesn't last long after a few use but it's still a better deal than going to the salon
customer_reviews.author: Becca A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very poor power. Barely felt the roller. Disappointed after reading the great reviews. Wish there was really a product out there that was HEAVY DUTY and really got the dead skin off!!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: ViAmber

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was contemplating between getting this one versus the more expensive brand name ones, but I'm so glad I didn't waste the extra money. This little gadget does exactly what it claims to do. I especially like the fact that it won't allow you to push too hard so you can't over do it and end up hurting yourself. I also like how there is a coarse and super coarse option because there are some areas that require a little more aggressive removal and others a little less. Overall very pleased with the fast delivery and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Park

customer_reviews.title: I love this little tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool! It came already charged so I started using it as soon as I opened it. I LOVE it, it took years worth of gross callouses and dead skin off my feet. I used it each day for about a week followed up with a good moisturizer. SO SO happy with it. Ive got new improved feet like I've not seen in many years! I've been using ALL kinds of creams and lotions and a hand-held file for years and nothing works like this little gem!
customer_reviews.author: Lifetime Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but not great either.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 3 1/2 stars but I'll give it the benefit of the doubt. It's a pretty good device. It is stronger than probably most battery operated versions, but it's still not going to work miracles for you. It takes a REALLY long time to get the job done, but it eventually does. If you are patient, you will probably eventually get the most hardened skin sanded off, but it's not as quick as you might think. It most definitely does not eliminate the need to have a routine pedicure, but you might be able to squeeze in an additional week between pedicures if you use this.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: I thought this machine will work and last for a long time. Boy, I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this item, I was very happy because I could just charge it to start using without the worry of changing batteries. However, I only used it for a few months and the machine already lost power. It just became so weak and moving slowly. I got no choice to throw it away. I am surprised it has descent rating because it is useless. I should have purchased it from a more known vendor like Amope Pedi.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Feet in Minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the roller would not be wide enough, but it is actually better than a wider one since it conforms easier to the curved areas of the foot. I was not disappointed in the results. It is used on dry skin versus soften skin that has been soaked. This allows that impulse use versus planning a foot soak which can be a great timesaver and convenient. Easy to hold as it is lightweight and conforms to the hand comfortably. No vibration felt - great power with its rechargeable battery which I prefer over the battery operated devices. Easy to clean rollers and head.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously needs more power.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use...but it doesn't meet the hype. It works great if you go extremely slow. It stops even if you put a little pressure on it. I have rough heals, and although it did a nice job smoothing them it took a long time. I had to be to gentle to keep it from stopping every 2 seconds. I'm seriously thinking about sending it back because it takes to long to do just my heels. Would be great if it actually had more power.
customer_reviews.author: Maddaroad

customer_reviews.title: money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Man, so happy I purchased this. My feet were just starting to get thick on the heels and after using it, my feet are so much softer. I need to use it once a week to keep my feet soft and to keep the callouses under control. I don't get pedicures but now I don't have.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than others
customer_reviews.text: This device is powerful enough to remove thick calluses in a short amount of time. The rechargeable battery makes it very convenient and it lasts a long time. I would say it surpassed 45 minutes before needing to be charged. This product comes at an amazing price in comparison to less powerful units on the market. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Only used once. Didn't work like I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best decision made
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My feet look wonderful, and it didn't die while doing them. I had ordered a month ago the battery operated callus remover and I couldn't put any pressure on it or it would die out. So I went ahead and ordered another one, this one, and having that extra power really made a difference. Very happy I spent the few extra dollars. The hand operated one that is all over the TV doesn't even hold a candle to this callus remover. I can do my heels once and it is good for quite a while. Perfect for flip flop season!!!
customer_reviews.author: missmac

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Holds Charge
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this item for 10 months, used it approx 1xper month - no longer holds the charge, even when plugged in overnight. Will no longer work on feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bell

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the rougher my heals become. Now my feet feel as soft as a baby's feet. Although I charged for 6-8 hours before use, the charge did not hold more than 35-40 minutes. I finished with the product plugged in (charging). I also bought one for my adult daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Grama

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful amazing product
customer_reviews.text: We had been using the Pedi Egg brand battery powered similar product. The power out of this unit is amazing! I was able to remove all dead skin from my feet in about 1/4 of the time that the Pedi Egg version would take. This is one of the best purchases I have ever made on Amazon. If you are looking for a product to smooth your feet, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Callus Remover...Ever!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic device! I have such bad calluses on my feet, they need weekly attention, and this remover makes that job so easy. I love that it's portable, and that the charge lasts until I'm finished. It's easy to clean and charge up for the next time. The customer service department is awesome. I misplaced my charging cord, and emailed them on a Saturday, asking about a replacement. Not only did they get back to me within a few hours, but offered to send me a new cord...free! Order one, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product works wonders. So far the BEST product I have ever used for my callouses. Mine were splitting & it hurt to walk. Now they are smooth & I have only done it 3 times. *I do also put O'keefes on at night. But before I was using O'keefes & other brands of these things & nothing worked as well!!! And the other brands COST DOUBLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Getz

customer_reviews.title: Smooth beautiful heels! And disappears calouses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 4 years ago. I am just now buying replacement rollers.... although it still works pretty well. I love this product! It completely smooths rough heels. And if you pay attention to callouses, and use this product on them, they practically disappear. This is the greatest product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Electric Callus Remover Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: If I had to rate this item it certainly would be above ten. I have researched many products, but this for pass any item I almost bought. Your product is indeed a wonder. It has met all my needs. So nice to not have sheets pulling on rough spots of heels. My feet are so pretty now. Not ashamed of wearing sandals. Love love your product. Highly recommend to anyone with cracked heels.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best foot care tool I have , I had a battery operated one from another company and it does not hold a candle to this electric one.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

product_meta.title: Care me Powerful Electric Foot Callus Remover Rechargeable-Top Rated Electronic Foot File Removes Dry, Dead, Hard, Cracked Skin & Calluses- Best Foot Care Pedicure Tool for Soft Smooth Feet
feature_bullets: POWERFUL & EFFECTIVELY - Improved Powerful Motor Spins an Amazing 40 turns/sec revealing Your Baby Soft & Smooth Feet in mins. If You prefer to use Extra Strength, You need to try this Electronic Foot Scrubber. Apply on Dry Feet.

PREMIUM LONG-LASTING BATTERY - Unlike other brands with inferior batteries to save the cost, our callous removers have built-in 800 mAH Nickel-Hydride rechargeable battery with approximately 800-hour lifespan. Charges 8 hours and Powerfully Runs for 40 mins.

FOOT PEDICURE SPA RESULTS - Must Have Pedicure Foot Care Tool! Pamper your feet with this foot grinder for professional spa-like pedicure at a fraction cost. Safer and Tougher than foot rasp, scraper, sander, scrubber or other grater tools. Get Sexy, Smooth & Soft Feet At Home or On-the-Go!

BEST VALUE FOR YOUR MONEY - Contains Two Large, Premium, Durable, Super Coarse Rollers made of micro pedi mineral crystals for all your needs. Two Types of Refill available: Super Coarse & Medium Coarse. Search Care me Refill Rollers on Amazon.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - 2000+ VERIFIED REVIEWS at 4.5 Stars! Trusted by Thousands of Happy Customers! Back up by 6-mon Manufacturer's Warranty making it a no-brainer deal! Best Pedicure Foot Care Gift for him or her.
The charging voltage is 110-120v that is applied in USA, Canada & Mexico. If you are in other countries, please check Care me Callus Remover Model#203 on amazon.com/dp/B07ZC6M8NP
